text: a few of our recipes today have used
chilies and up until now we've used the
seeds and everything's we've read ones
that heat but one subscriber buccal
monkey has asked me to demonstrate how
to do the proper prep of chilies which
is easy for him to say but I thought I'd
show you the best two methods of
preparing and chili without the seeds
the first is to take the top off of the
chili and then just roll it between your
hands over being or something all the
seeds will fall out and what you're left
with is a chili with no seeds next point
you can slice and get rings of chili
with no seeds for second way will be to
take off the top slice all the way down
one side and then carve around so you're
actually taking out all that cedar
membrane from the inside now you've got
one sheet of chili which you can slice
into thin strips turn and then slice
them to a very small dice so whether
it's a slice or a dice of chili you want
there's two methods you can use that
involve no seeds just remember to always
wash your hands and if you've got any
other questions you want to ask those
food based things you think we've
overlooked then leave a comment below
and we'll see if we can respond to them
